# External repos

This directory contains all the necessary repositories for `insight-idm?` console.dot
initiative.

## Interesting related repositories

- [Insights Host Inventory](https://github.com/RedHatInsights/insights-host-inventory).
- [Insights Remediations](https://github.com/RedHatInsights/insights-remediations).
- [Insights Image Builder Frontend](https://github.com/RedHatInsights/image-builder-frontend).
- [Insights Image Builder]().

- [rhc-osdk-utils](https://github.com/RedHatInsights/rhc-osdk-utils).
- [rhc-worker-playbook](https://github.com/RedHatInsights/rhc-worker-playbook).
- [rhc](https://github.com/RedHatInsights/rhc).
- [rhc-catalog-worker](https://github.com/RedHatInsights/rhc-catalog-worker).
